profile.description: I sit at the crossroads of software engineering and analytics—building features with precision and clarity. My superpowers: blending a foundation in statistics, a background in communication (psychology), and carefully built technical acumen to craft workflows, code, and communication that remain clear and sharp, and that keep stakeholders excited. Professionally or in gaming, I consider myself a completionist.
highlights: Communication & Collaboration – clear, empathetic, and reliable
Organization & Structure – highly systematic in both solo and team projects (Conscientiousness: 96th percentile, Self-Discipline: 96th percentile!)
Drive & Growth Mindset – motivated, self-directed, and quick to learn
